text: @brandondarby @dbongino ...and when the #COVID19 cases and deaths spike - the #Liberal #MSM will continue to blame @realDonaldTrump - Interesting how demonstrations are acceptable but opening up Main St and going back to work isn’t 🤔🤔 - I need a haircut 😡
